bundle_parameters.author_list: Murakami, S.; Yamamoto Y.; McGouldrick K; Hashimoto G. L.; Hirata N.

kernel.description: Generic SPICE LSK file incorporating leapseconds up to December 31, $DATE, created by NAIF, JPL.
Generic SPICE PCK file containing constants from the $REPORT report, created by NAIF, JPL.

VCO SPICE PCK file created by merging GM values for Venus and Venus barycenter used in the Venus Climate Orbiter (VCO, also known as PLANET-C and AKATSUKI) mission with NAIF generic PCK, gm_de431.tpc.
VCO SPICE Frames Kernel file created by ISAS/JAXA.

This frame kernel defines a number of mission independent frames that could be used by any of the users of any of the ESA planetary missions, and that are not 'built' in the SPICE toolkit. Only the filename and the attached PDS label have been modified by ISAS/JAXA for providing this file as a part of the dataset of Venus Climate Orbiter (VCO, also known as PLANET-C and AKATSUKI) mission.
SPICE I-Kernel (IK) file containing FOV and reference frame definitions for the VCO 1-um Camera (IR1) instrument, created by ISAS/JAXA.
SPICE I-Kernel (IK) file containing FOV and reference frame definitions for the VCO 2-um Camera (IR2) instrument, created by ISAS/JAXA.
SPICE I-Kernel (IK) file containing FOV and reference frame definitions for the VCO Lightning and Airglow Camera (LAC) instrument, created by ISAS/JAXA.
SPICE I-Kernel (IK) file containing FOV and reference frame definitions for the VCO Longwave Infrared camera (LIR) instrument, created by ISAS/JAXA.
SPICE I-Kernel (IK) file containing FOV and reference frame definitions for the VCO Ultra Violet Imager (UVI) instrument, created by ISAS/JAXA.
VCO SPICE Spacecraft Clock Kernel (SCLK) file containing information required for the Venus Climate Orbiter (VCO, also known as PLANET-C and AKATSUKI) spacecraft on-board clock to UTC conversion.
Generic SPICE SPK file providing planetary ephemeris for the various phases of the Venus Climate Orbiter (VCO, also known as PLANET-C and AKATSUKI) mission.
VCO SPICE reconstructed SPK file providing the Venus Climate Orbiter (VCO, also known as PLANET-C and AKATSUKI) spacecraft trajectory created by the ISAS orbit determination group, JAXA.

VCO SPICE predicted CK file providing the Venus Climate Orbiter (VCO, also known as PLANET-C and AKATSUKI) spacecraft orientation only covering the gap of reconstructed CK created by the PLANET-C Project Team, ISAS/JAXA.
VCO SPICE reconstructed CK file providing the Venus Climate Orbiter (VCO, also known as PLANET-C and AKATSUKI) spacecraft orientation created by the PLANET-C Project Team, ISAS/JAXA.
VCO SPICE reconstructed CK file providing SAP's orientation of the Venus Climate Orbiter (VCO, also known as PLANET-C and AKATSUKI) spacecraft created by the PLANET-C Project Team, ISAS/JAXA.
VCO SPICE predicted CK file providing nominal SAP's orientation of the Venus Climate Orbiter (VCO, also known as PLANET-C and AKATSUKI) spacecraft created by the PLANET-C Project Team, ISAS/JAXA.
VCO SPICE predicted CK file providing nominal SAP's orientation of the Venus Climate Orbiter (VCO, also known as PLANET-C and AKATSUKI) spacecraft created by the PLANET-C Project Team, ISAS/JAXA.
SPICE MK file listing kernels, created by ISAS, JAXA.

event_detection_frame.description: Venus Mean Equator of date J2000

pck.description: ESA planetary missions using IAU 2000 report constants
